submodules.title: Task Management UI
submodules.description: A clean and intuitive interface that allows users to easily add, complete, and delete tasks. The design focuses on usability, ensuring that users can manage their tasks efficiently without distractions.

submodules.title: Responsive Design
submodules.description: The application is designed to be fully responsive, providing an optimal viewing experience across a wide range of devices, from desktops to mobile phones. This ensures that users can manage their tasks anytime, anywhere.

submodules.title: Light/Dark Theme Toggle
submodules.description: An optional feature that allows users to switch between light and dark themes, enhancing user experience based on their preferences and reducing eye strain in different lighting conditions.

submodules.title: Add Tasks
submodules.description: Users can easily add new tasks with a simple input field. The application validates the input to ensure that no empty tasks are added, promoting a clutter-free task list.

submodules.title: Complete Tasks
submodules.description: Tasks can be marked as done using a checkbox feature. This allows users to visually track their progress and provides a sense of accomplishment as they complete their tasks.

submodules.title: Delete Tasks
submodules.description: Users have the ability to delete tasks they no longer need. This feature includes a confirmation prompt to prevent accidental deletions, ensuring that users can manage their task list effectively.

submodules.title: Filter Tasks
submodules.description: An optional filtering feature that allows users to view all tasks, only active tasks, or only completed tasks. This helps users focus on what needs to be done or review their completed tasks.

submodules.title: LocalStorage Integration
submodules.description: Tasks are saved in the browser's localStorage, ensuring that user data persists even after the application is closed. This feature allows users to return to their task list without losing any information.

submodules.title: Data Retrieval
submodules.description: Upon loading the application, tasks are retrieved from localStorage and displayed in the task management UI. This ensures a seamless user experience as users can immediately see their tasks.

submodules.title: Minimalistic Design
submodules.description: The application embraces a minimalistic design philosophy, focusing on essential features and eliminating unnecessary elements. This approach enhances user engagement and makes task management straightforward.

submodules.title: User Feedback
submodules.description: The application provides visual feedback for user actions, such as task completion and deletion. This includes animations and notifications that confirm actions, improving overall user satisfaction.
